content: i made this **little bird amigurumi** as an ornament for my christmas tree but it can also be a small toy for your kids or a hanging ornament for baby nurseries stroller chains etc *this pattern is written in us terms* **materials** 2 75-mm c/2 usa 12 uk crochet hook dk 3 medium weight yarn one stitch marker to work in the round tapestry needle stuffing 2 safety eyes 5 mm **yarn** i used **paintbox yarns cotton dk** 137 yds 125 m per 50 g in the following colors **cream** vanilla cream 408 **light brown** soft fudge 410 **orange** blood orange 420 **red** pillar red 415 **white** champagne white 403 feel free to use any yarn with the appropriate hook **size** 3 8 cm long 2 5 cm tall and 2 5 cm large **gauge** this pattern is too small to accurately determine the gauge **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni
